title: Bitter, Incomplete Divorce Blamed For South Sudan's Fighting
teaser: What happened after Africa's biggest country split in two? Renee Montagne talks to James Copnall about his book, A Poisonous Thorn in Our Hearts: Sudan and South Sudan's Bitter and Incomplete Divorce.
